subject: Football
lead_paragraph: They are two head coaches in the same division playing a big division game this week. That is how Patriots Coach Bill Belichick prefers to look at Sunday’s game against Coach Eric Mangini and the Jets.
snippet: They are two head coaches in the same division playing a big division game this week. That is how Patriots Coach Bill Belichick prefers to look at Sunday’s game against Coach Eric Mangini and the Jets.
